name: Tequila and Watermelon
description: The most crowd-pleasing summer highball there is: a little sweet, a little spicy and exuberantly pink.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass with ice and add tequila, watermelon, salt and a squeeze of lime. Top with soda water. Float a couple of slices of jalapeño on the drink to garnish.

video.name: Tequila and Watermelon
video.description: How to make this crowd-pleasing highball, which is a little sweet, a little spicy and exuberantly pink.
